attributes.action: Abolish Prescription Charges For Heart Disease Suffers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Long term sufferers with heart disease have to pay out every month to stay alive, the only cheap way round this is a Pre-payment card, and surely this can not be right that we have to pay to live? We have paid once and now have to suffer even more!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish Prescription Charges For Heart Disease Suffers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14192.asp

Prime Minister's Office
